para.emphasis: Leading-edge projection-based reduced order models (pROMs) for dynamical systems in science and engineering.

detaileddescription.para: You landed on the documentation of the Python bindings library!
If this is a mistake, please go back to the project website.

sect1.title: License and Citation

sect1.title: Questions?
